name: AnduinDivineStarPowerWordShield
title: Power Word: Shield
description: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 172 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

name: ArtanisShieldOverloadForceofWill
title: Force of Will
description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

name: AzmodanHeroicAbilityDemonicInvasion
title: Demonic Invasion
description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

name: BrightwingPhaseShiftHyperShift
title: Hyper Shift
description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

name: ChoUppercut
title: Uppercut
description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

name: DVaBoostersHitTheNitrous
title: Hit the Nitrous
description: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

name: GallEdgeOfMadness
title: Edge of Madness
description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 12% damage, to a maximum of 60%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.

name: IllidanMasteryFriendOrFoeDive
title: Friend or Foe
description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

name: MalfurionMasteryHinderingMoonfire
title: Hindering Moonfire
description: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

name: MalthaelSoulSiphon
title: Soul Siphon
description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

name: MephistoConsumeSouls
title: Consume Souls
description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

name: MephistoShadeOfMephistoShadeLord
title: Shade Lord
description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

name: MurkyFishEye
title: Fish Eye
description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

name: WitchDoctorHeroicAbilityGargantuan
title: Gargantuan
description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

name: StukovVirulentReaction
title: Virulent Reaction
description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

name: SylvanasTalentLifeDrain
title: Life Drain
description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

name: ButcherMasteryFreshMeatBloodFrenzy
title: Blood Frenzy
description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

name: UtherMasteryWaveofLightHolyRadiance
title: Wave of Light
description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

name: NecromancerTalentHarvestVitality
title: Harvest Vitality
description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

name: ZagaraMasteryMutalisk
title: Mutalisk
description: Reduce the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 4 seconds.  Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.
